item.title: 货币贬值后，S&P 上调埃及信用展望
item.description: 在期待已久的货币贬值有望缓解外汇短缺之后，S&P 全球评级公司将埃及的信用前景提升为正面。【原文：Egypt’s credit outlook was lifted to positive by S&P Global Ratings after a long-awaited currency devaluation was poised to ease foreign currency shortages.】

item.title: 星巴克任命新的地区领导人协助监督增长计划
item.description: 星巴克公司（Starbucks Corp.）宣布对其地区行政架构进行调整，作为其积极扩张努力的一部分。【原文：Starbucks Corp. announced changes to its regional executive structure as part of its aggressive expansion efforts.】

item.title: BAE 系统公司希望至少出资 40 亿美元收购波尔宇航公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英国防务公司 BAE Systems Plc 正在向投资者征询出售公司债券的意向，金额可能高达 40 亿美元，以帮助该公司为收购波尔宇航公司（Ball Aerospace）所使用的过桥贷款进行再融资。【原文：UK defense company BAE Systems Plc is sounding out investors for a corporate bond sale that could top $4 billion to help refinance a bridge loan it used to acquire Ball Aerospace, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: YOLO 一族押注英伟达周五价值可能翻倍以上
item.description: 全球市值第三大公司英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., the world’s third-largest company by market value, is turning into a casino for the YOLO trading crowd.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 OKX 将在欧洲撤销 Tether 交易对
item.description: 加密货币交易所 OKX 将终止对欧洲经济区用户使用 Tether Holdings Ltd 的 USDT 代币交易数字货币的支持。【原文：Crypto exchange OKX is ending its support of digital currencies traded against Tether Holdings Ltd’s USDT token for users based in the European Economic Area.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司首席执行官呼吁美国在 11 月结束暂停液化天然气许可的做法
item.description: 总部位于休斯顿、液化天然气业务不断增长的石油和天然气生产商康菲石油公司首席执行官瑞安-兰斯（Ryan Lance）说，拜登政府暂停液化天然气出口许可的做法必须在 11 月总统大选后结束。【原文：The Biden administration’s pause on liquefied natural gas export licenses needs to end after November’s presidential election, said Ryan Lance, chief executive of ConocoPhillips, the Houston-based oil and gas producer with a growing LNG business.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）卸下 105 亿美元悬置市场的 SVB 贷款
item.description: 自去年银行业危机以来，一直笼罩在美国信贷市场流动性不足一角的风险似乎已悄然消失。【原文：A risk that’s been hanging over an illiquid corner of the US credit market since last year’s banking crisis seems to have been quietly taken off the table.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利警告美股面临 "美元体制转变 "风险
item.description: 摩根士丹利财富管理公司（Morgan Stanley Wealth Management）首席投资官向股票多头发出警告：压制美元的结构性力量有可能反过来蔓延到美国股市。【原文：The chief investment officer of Morgan Stanley Wealth Management has a warning for stock bulls: the structural forces weighing on the dollar are threatening to spread to US equities in turn.】

item.title: 国债 ETF 遭遇创纪录连败，20 亿美元资金外流
item.description: 在本周央行做出两项关键决定之前，国债投资者正匆忙退出全球最大的长期限 ETF。【原文：Treasury investors are rushing for the exit in the world’s biggest long-maturity ETF ahead of two key central-bank decisions this week.】

item.title: 汽油价格红火反弹预示夏季油价飙升
item.description: 由于俄罗斯炼油厂生产中断和美国燃料库存减少，加剧了夏季驾车出行前的供应担忧，美国汽油期货创下六个月新高。【原文：US gasoline futures have hit a six-month high as disruptions at Russian oil refineries and dwindling US fuel stockpiles exacerbate supply concerns ahead of summer driving months.】

item.title: Soho House 在私有化谈判中一跃而起，主席斥责投资者
item.description: Soho House & Co Inc.在其控股股东暗示该会员制俱乐部私有化取得进展，同时在一封公开信中抱怨投资者只关注短期利润后，创下一年多来最大涨幅。【原文：Soho House & Co Inc. jumped the most in more than a year after its controlling shareholder hinted at progress around the members-only club going private, while bemoaning in a public letter that investors are focused on short-term profits.】

item.title: 纳格尔称银行联盟的缺失类似于系统性失败
item.description: 2024年2月23日星期五，德国法兰克福，德意志联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）在央行 "2023年度报告 "新闻发布会后接受彭博电视采访。"纳格尔说："当我们谈论金融市场时，以循序渐进的方式来做这样的事情往往会更好。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Joachim Nagel, president of Deutsche Bundesbank, during A Bloomberg Television interview following the central bank's "Annual Report 2023" news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, on Friday, Feb. 23, 2024. "When we’re talking about financial markets, it’s often better to do things like that in a gradual manner," Nagel said. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 阿姆洛庆祝石油接管周年，誓言支持墨西哥石油公司
item.description: 墨西哥总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）表示，墨西哥将继续支持国营石油生产商墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos），因为该公司正努力提高当地炼油厂的产量，并减少巨额债务负担。【原文：Mexico President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said the nation will continue to support state oil producer Petroleos Mexicanos as the company works to ramp up production at its local refineries and reduce its massive debt load.】

item.title: 佛罗里达高铁再次下调 2024 年乘客量预测
item.description: 佛罗里达州的高速铁路系统 Brightline 在披露 2024 年的预计乘客量下降 21% 三个月后，再次下调了预测。【原文：Three months after Florida’s high-speed rail system, Brightline, disclosed a 21% decline in projected ridership for 2024, it’s cutting its forecast again.】

item.title: 埃克森公司首席执行官表示愿意就圭亚那问题与雪佛龙公司对话
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）在接受采访时表示，埃克森美孚公司愿意与雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is open to talking to Chevron Corp. about its proposed takeover of Hess Corp. as the oil giants spar over the deal’s implications for a massive offshore oil project in Guyana, Chief Executive Officer Darren Woods said in an interview.】

item.title: 越来越多的美国人怀疑他们的汽车和住房贷款能否获得批准
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行进行的一项调查显示，美国人越来越怀疑他们能否获批贷款买车或进行抵押贷款再融资。【原文：Americans increasingly doubt they’ll get approved for a loan to buy a car or refinance a mortgage, according to a survey conducted by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 英普拉茨津巴布韦分公司计划自愿裁员以控制成本
item.description: 由于金属价格低迷，安派拉铂金控股有限公司（Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd.）的津巴布韦分公司正在向员工提供自愿裁员计划，以削减成本。【原文：Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd.’s Zimbabwean unit is offering staff voluntary redundancy packages to cut costs because of anemic metal prices.】

item.title: 了解美国财政部的非凡权力
item.description:
美国财政部影响范围的演变。【原文：

The evolution of the reach of US Treasury Department’s reach.

】

item.title: 日经指数》称日本央行将结束收益率曲线控制，周二将买入 ETF
item.description: 据《日经新闻》报道，日本央行准备在周二结束收益率曲线控制和风险资产购买，但未说明该消息从何而来。【原文：The Bank of Japan is poised to end its yield curve control and purchases of risk assets on Tuesday, Nikkei reported, without saying where it got the information.】

item.title: 贡渥集团称无人机关闭了俄罗斯 60 万桶炼油厂
item.description: 贡渥集团有限公司（Gunvor Group Ltd.贡渥集团首席执行官托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）估计，乌克兰无人机的袭击导致俄罗斯每天约 60 万桶的炼油能力被摧毁。【原文：Gunvor Group Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Torbjörn Törnqvist estimates about 600,000 barrels of Russia’s daily oil-refining capacity has been knocked out by Ukrainian drone strikes.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺称降息可能有助于防止经济衰退
item.description: 2023 年 2 月 13 日星期一，葡萄牙央行葡萄牙银行行长马里奥-森特诺在英国伦敦接受彭博电视采访。森特诺表示，通胀前景需要回到欧洲央行的目标附近，才能证明放缓加息步伐是合理的。摄影师Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：Mario Centeno, governor of Banco de Portugal, Portugal's central bank, during a Bloomberg Television interview in London, UK, on Monday, Feb. 13, 2023. The outlook for inflation would need to head back to near the European Central Bank's target to justify a slowing in the pace of interest-rate increases, according Centeno. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.title: 对冲基金就交易商注册问题起诉美国证券交易委员会的最新进展
item.description: 对冲基金再次对美国证券交易委员会发起法律诉讼，这次是针对要求一些公司注册为美国国债市场交易商的新规定。【原文：Hedge funds launched another legal salvo against the Securities and Exchange Commission, this time over new rules requiring some firms to register as dealers in the US Treasuries market.】

item.title: 彼得罗为哥伦比亚宪法重修制定长远计划
item.description: 古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）总统正试图为他修改哥伦比亚宪法的努力争取民众的支持，但由于立法和司法方面的障碍，这一努力成功的几率很小。【原文：President Gustavo Petro is trying to build popular support for his bid to overhaul Colombia’s constitution, which faces long odds of success given legislative and judicial hurdles.】

item.title: 霸菱在转型期暂停私人信贷投资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一封客户信称，霸菱有限责任公司（Barings LLC）正在暂停对其私人信贷基金进行新的投资，同时这些基金正在向新的领导层过渡，在此之前，已有 20 多名员工离职，转投新贵科林西亚全球管理公司（Corinthia Global Management）。【原文：Barings LLC is pausing making new investments across its private credit funds while they transition to new leadership, according to a client letter seen by Bloomberg News, after over 20 employees left for upstart Corinthia Global Management.】

item.title: 国际清算银行的卡斯滕斯说：央行不应过早欢呼胜利
英国《金融时报》称，德勤为在严峻市场中削减成本进行结构调整
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，德勤正在寻求彻底改革其结构，因为这家专业服务公司希望在市场放缓之前削减成本。【原文：Deloitte is looking to overhaul its structure as the professional services firm looks to cut costs ahead of a market slowdown, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 高盛向 Tishman Speyer 出售泽西市海滨地块
item.description: Tishman Speyer 从高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Tishman Speyer bought land beneath apartments it’s developing on the Jersey City waterfront, from Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 最炙手可热的商品从五张图表看可可的历史性飙升
item.description: 由于担心可可短缺，可可价格几乎每天都创出新高，可可的破纪录增长没有放缓的迹象。【原文：Cocoa’s record-breaking run shows no sign of slowing as fears over shortages send prices to new highs on an almost daily basis.】

item.title: 两艘装载俄罗斯乌拉尔石油的油轮在印度附近海域闲置数周
item.description: 两艘载有俄罗斯旗舰产品乌拉尔原油的油轮在印度西海岸闲置了三个多星期，没有任何迹象表明它们将在何时卸货。【原文：Two tankers carrying Russian flagship Urals crude have been idling off the West Coast of India for more than three weeks without any indication of when they will unload.】

item.title: 路易斯安那天然气项目在能源转让公司与开发商的争执中推迟
item.description: 由于 Energy Transfer LP 与竞争对手天然气项目开发商之间的法律纠纷，路易斯安那州的一条输气管道被推迟。【原文：A Louisiana pipeline has been delayed as a legal battle rages between Energy Transfer LP and rival natural gas project developers.】
